blogger.faq.title: Questions?
blogger.faq.q1: What exactly do I have to do as a Blogger Partner?
blogger.faq.a1: Write blog articles about expat life, travel, immigration, visas, or living abroad. Include your unique affiliate link in articles. When readers call a lawyer or expat helper, you earn $10. That's it!
blogger.faq.q2: How much can I realistically earn?
blogger.faq.a2: It depends on your blog traffic. 10 clients = $100. 50 clients = $500. Some bloggers earn $1000-3000/month by writing SEO-optimized articles that rank well on Google.
blogger.faq.a3: Expat helpers are experienced expats who provide practical advice and guidance. They're not lawyers, but they know the local system well and can help with everyday questions about visas, administration, housing, etc.
blogger.faq.a4: You get article templates, ready-to-copy texts in 9 languages, HD logos, banners, and a complete integration guide with SEO best practices.
blogger.faq.q5: How and when do I get paid?
blogger.faq.a5: Withdraw anytime once you reach $50. We support Wise, PayPal, Mobile Money, and bank transfers. Payments processed within 48 hours.
blogger.faq.q6: Do I need a specific blog topic?
blogger.faq.a6: Your blog should relate to expat life, travel, immigration, or similar topics. We provide article templates if you need inspiration!
blogger.final.title: Ready to Monetize Your Blog?
blogger.final.subtitle: It's free, resources included, start earning today.

chatter.schema.howto.name: How to Become a SOS-Expat Chatter and Earn Money
chatter.schema.howto.description: Step-by-step guide to joining the Chatter affiliate program and earning $10 per referred call plus team-based passive income.
chatter.schema.step1.name: Register for Free
chatter.schema.step1.text: Sign up on SOS-Expat, pass a quick 5-question quiz (2 minutes), and get your unique affiliate link.
chatter.schema.step2.name: Find People Who Need Help
chatter.schema.step2.text: Search for expats, travelers, or immigrants who need legal assistance abroad. Look in Facebook groups, WhatsApp groups, Reddit communities, or your personal network.
chatter.schema.step3.name: Share Your Link
chatter.schema.step3.text: Share your unique affiliate link with people who need help. When they call a lawyer or expat helper through your link, you earn $10.
chatter.schema.step4.name: Get Paid
chatter.schema.step4.text: Withdraw your earnings when you reach $25 minimum. Payments via Mobile Money (Orange Money, Wave, MTN MoMo, M-Pesa), Wise, or bank transfer within 48 hours.
chatter.schema.job.title: SOS-Expat Chatter - Affiliate Partner

chatter.schema.job.responsibilities: Find people who need legal help abroad and share your affiliate link. Build a team of chatters for passive income.
chatter.schema.job.qualifications: No experience required. Must pass a simple 5-question quiz about SOS-Expat.
chatter.schema.job.incentive: $10 per referred call, $1 per call from direct recruits (N1), $0.50 per call from indirect recruits (N2)

chatter.faq.title: Questions?
chatter.faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started
chatter.faq.q1: What exactly do I have to do?
chatter.faq.a1: It's simple: join Facebook groups for expats (like 'Expats in Spain', 'French in London'...), WhatsApp groups, Reddit, forums. When you see someone with a problem (visa, legal, emergency), share your unique link. When they call a lawyer or expat helper, you earn $10. That's it!
chatter.faq.q2: How much can I realistically earn?
chatter.faq.a2: It depends on your activity. 5 clients = $50. 20 clients = $200. Some chatters earn $500-2000/month by building a team of other chatters and earning 5% of their earnings forever.
chatter.faq.a3: Expat helpers are experienced expats who provide practical advice and guidance. They're not lawyers, but they know the local system well and can help with everyday questions about visas, administration, housing, etc.
chatter.faq.a4: 100% free. No fees, no investment needed. You just need to pass a quick quiz to prove you understand how SOS-Expat works, then you get your affiliate links immediately.
chatter.faq.q5: How and when do I get paid?
chatter.faq.a5: Withdraw anytime once you reach $25. We support Wise (worldwide), Orange Money, Wave, MTN MoMo, M-Pesa, Airtel Money, and bank transfers. Payments processed within 48 hours.
chatter.faq.q6: Do I need to be an expert?
chatter.faq.a6: No! You don't give advice. You just connect people who need help with our lawyers and expat helpers. You're a connector, not an expert.
chatter.final.title: Ready to Start Earning?
chatter.final.subtitle: It's free, it's simple, and you can start right now.

influencer.step1.title: Create Content
influencer.step1.desc: Make videos about expat life, travel tips, visa advice, living abroad. Use our banners and promo texts to promote SOS-Expat.
influencer.step2.title: Share Your Link
influencer.step2.desc: Add your unique affiliate link in video descriptions, bio, stories. Your followers get 5% off their first call!
influencer.step2.example: Link in bio for 5% off your first call with a lawyer or expat helper!
influencer.step3.title: Get Paid $10
influencer.step3.desc: When followers make a call through your link, you earn $10. Withdraw anytime via Wise, PayPal, or bank transfer.
influencer.note.title: Lawyers AND Expat Helpers
influencer.note.desc: SOS-Expat connects people with professional lawyers AND experienced expat helpers. Lawyers for legal matters, expat helpers for practical advice. Both available instantly by phone, worldwide.
influencer.tools.title: Promo Tools Included
influencer.tools.subtitle: Everything you need to promote professionally
influencer.tools.box.title: All Tools Included Free
influencer.tools.box.desc: No need to create your own graphics. We provide everything.
influencer.platform.blog.name: Your Blog
influencer.example1.title: YouTube Video Idea:
influencer.example1.text: 5 Things I Wish I Knew Before Moving Abroad - Legal Tips
influencer.example1.action: Link SOS-Expat in description = $10 per call
influencer.example2.title: Instagram Story:
influencer.example2.text: Need legal help abroad? I use this service ‚Üí Swipe up for 5% off!
influencer.example2.action: Follower books a call = $10 for you
influencer.earnings.title: How Much Can You Earn?
influencer.earnings.perCall: Per client call to a lawyer or expat helper
influencer.earnings.partner: Per call to your lawyer/helper partners
influencer.earnings.partner.desc: Find a lawyer or expat helper to join SOS-Expat. Every time they receive a call, you earn $5 passively!
influencer.earnings.discount.desc: Your followers automatically get 5% off their first call. It's an exclusive benefit that makes your link more valuable!
influencer.passive.title: Find Lawyer & Helper Partners
influencer.passive.subtitle: Know a lawyer or experienced expat? Help them join SOS-Expat and earn $5 every time they receive a call!
influencer.payment.title: Get Paid Your Way
influencer.faq.title: Questions?
influencer.faq.q1: What exactly do I have to do as an Influencer?
influencer.faq.a1: Create content about expat life, travel, or immigration on YouTube, Instagram, TikTok or your blog. Include your unique affiliate link. When your followers call a lawyer or expat helper, you earn $10. That's it!
influencer.faq.q2: How much can I realistically earn?
influencer.faq.a2: It depends on your audience size. 10 clients = $100. 50 clients = $500. Some influencers earn $1000-5000/month by finding lawyer/helper partners and earning $5 per call they receive.
influencer.faq.a3: Expat helpers are experienced expats who provide practical advice and guidance. They're not lawyers, but they know the local system well and can help with everyday questions about visas, administration, housing, etc.
influencer.faq.q4: What promo tools do I get?
influencer.faq.a4: You get ready-made banners, interactive widgets for your website, personalized QR codes, promo texts in 9 languages, and high-quality logos. Everything you need to promote professionally.
influencer.faq.q5: How and when do I get paid?
influencer.faq.a5: Withdraw anytime once you reach $50. We support Wise, PayPal, and bank transfers. Payments processed within 48 hours.
influencer.faq.q6: What discount do my followers get?
influencer.faq.a6: Your followers automatically get 5% off their first call when they use your link. It's an exclusive benefit for your community!
influencer.final.title: Ready to Become an Influencer?
influencer.final.subtitle: It's free, instant activation, promo tools included.
